      • loadPattern

        public void loadPattern(java.io.InputStream in)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        FileFormatException
        Description copied from interface: Life
        Loads a starting pattern for the game of life from an input stream.

        First line of input stream must have: "[x] [y]"

        • x - x position in board where pattern starts
        • y - y position in board where pattern starts

        Following that is any number of lines representing the pattern. Space denotes "dead" cells, and any character which is not a space denotes a "live" cell. Multiple patterns can be loaded onto the same board using this method.

        Specified by:
        loadPattern in interface Life
        Parameters:
        in - Input stream to load starting state from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        FileFormatException

      • printBoard

        public void printBoard(int width,
                       int height)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: Life
        Prints part of the current state of the board to stdout.

        printBoard(40, 40) will print the top left 40x40 section of the board.

        Specified by:
        printBoard in interface Life
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • clearBoard

        public void clearBoard()
        Clears the Game of Life board.

        Call before loadPattern() to start the Game of Life with a board containing just the loaded pattern.
